content.description: Start on a crimp rail, go up to a left-facing rail, and then up to the right to top out.
content.location: Start on the far left side of the Bloody Buddy boulder.

content.description: This is a linkup of Bloody Buddy and With The Famous Thighs. Sit start on the far right of the boulder, then traverse left. Once you hit the dog dish, continue left instead of rocking up, moving around the bulge to the left facing rail, then top out.
content.protection: At least 1-2 pads for the crux at the bulge

content.description: Start on jugs on the right and traverse left until you get to bowl-shaped hold about six inches in diameter.("dog dish hold") and top out up from there with a high right heel.
content.protection: A pad or two for the top out, otherwise you're not much more than a foot off the ground the whole way.
content.location: Start is on the obvious flake just before you get to the smaller boulder sitting on the ground that would make for annoying pad placement.

pathTokens: North Bank - Chaos Roof Area AKA Snowflake Boulder

content.description: Long, 6ish foot tall face directky downstream from Chaos Roof.
